Table oms.PaymentProviderDO

List of all payment providers.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
modificationDate timestamp without time zone  
name varchar(255) UNIQUE The name of the payment provider. Example "Klarna" 
partlyCaptureAllowed boolean NOT_NULL false  
partlyReverseAllowed boolean NOT_NULL false

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.
